page.title: 06LIFE STYLES - HOUSING
page.content:
The area contains some 55 dwellings. Our survey indicates that over 70% are more than 100 years old, 12% between 40 and 100 years old, 23% between 10 - 40 years old, and 6% less than 10 years old.
41% of homes are owner-occupied, 17% are rented, and 41% are 'tied' - part of the job.
Only 53% of homes have garages, but 82% have other outbuildings. 41% include greenhouses, 82% flower and vegetable gardens. 53% of homes have soft fruit bushes, and 47% fruit trees. 94% of homes enjoy lawns, with 82% having extra rough grass, and 59% with trees on the home's grounds.
